• Foreman /
  • Config templates /
  • index

GET /api/config_templates
List templates

Examples

GET /api/config_templates
200

Params

Param name Description
search
optional

filter results


Value: Must be String
order
optional

sort results


Value: Must be String
page
optional

paginate results


Value: Must be String
per_page
optional

number of entries per request


Value: Must be String
